column4: Anybody have trouble with 'spyware-remover-free.org'?  Looks like a scam pretending to help you detect and remove viruses. It won't go away How do I get rid of it?
What do you mean "won't go away"? Can you not close the browser window?
Right. The window will not close. I might expect something like this on windoze. Surprised to see it on Linux.
pkill firefox will kill firefox, and while this isn't necessary I'd "mv .mozilla .mozilla-bak" to start off fresh (it doesn't sound like the history / bookmarks are worth much)
